snippet: "The worm that succeeds in crawling up to the top of the pyarmid or Cheops is about as competent to judge of that structure, as Lamartine is to judge of the character and acts of Napoleon."--Boston Times, 2d. This paragraph proves nothing but the ...
lead_paragraph: "The worm that succeeds in crawling up to the top of the pyarmid or Cheops is about as competent to judge of that structure, as Lamartine is to judge of the character and acts of Napoleon."--Boston Times, 2d. This paragraph proves nothing but the incapacity of The Times to appreciated the character of Lamartine .
